text: That's as bloody silly as calling a Rolls-Royce a type of transport. She's the flower in a cultural desert. "Now, me -I'm a journalist, I write to entertain rather than educate. And I don't write at all unless I'm exceedingly 2skint."But I'll say this. I'd like to live in America and do some writing there. That5 a body slly ao callng a Ro
